Governance Articles of Association Internal Rules Technical Rules Code of Conduct About

Technical Rules

As set out in Title 11 of the Internal Rules, these Technical Rules govern the development of software within OpenWIS® Projects.

The Technical Committee is responsible for maintaining and evolving these Technical Rules. A first version of these rules will be published soon.
